sentences.en: About one sixth of the children admitted to taking drugs.
sentences.cn: 大约六分之一的儿童承认吸毒。

sentences.en: By 22nd November the Sixth Army was encircled.
sentences.cn: 到11月22日，第六军被包围了。

sentences.en: Carrie merely hastened her steps and took the Sixth Avenue car.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉只是加快了脚步,上了第六大道的有轨电车.

sentences.en: He lifted the cup for the sixth time this year.
sentences.cn: 他今年第六次赢得这项锦标.

sentences.en: How much is the sixth power of nine?
In Tokyo share prices have plummeted for the sixth successive day.
sentences.cn: 东京股价已连续第6天猛跌。

sentences.en: It is the sixth month in a row in which imports have fallen.
sentences.cn: 这是进口量持续下降的第6个月了。

sentences.en: My sixth sense told me to stay here and wait.
sentences.cn: 直觉告诉我应该待在这儿等着。

sentences.en: Ovarian cancer is the sixth most common cancer contracted by women.
sentences.cn: 卵巢癌是女性常患的第六大癌症。

sentences.en: Sue is in the sixth form now.
sentences.cn: 休正在读中学最后两年。

sentences.en: The couple met at a sixth form college in Solihull.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妇在索利哈尔的一所六年级学院相遇。

sentences.en: The interesting thing about O'Reilly is his sixth sense for finding people who have good ideas.
sentences.cn: 奥赖利的有趣之处在于，他能够凭直觉找到有好点子的人。

sentences.en: The manufacturing economy contracted in October for the sixth consecutive month.
sentences.cn: 10月，制造业经济已经连续第6个月出现萎缩状况。

sentences.en: The old man then went to question Sixth Treasure.
sentences.cn: 老通宝又去找六宝询问.

sentences.en: The very idea of a sixth form college was novel in 1962.
sentences.cn: 第六学级学院在1962年还是新提法。

sentences.en: They knew Sixth Treasure's words couldn't be entirely without foundation.
sentences.cn: 他们相信六宝的话不会毫无根据.

words.tran_cn: 第十六的；十六分之一的
第六十的；六十分之一的
（与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的

phrases.tran_cn: n. （英国中学里的）六年级，最高年级

trans.tran_cn: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
trans.tran_en: coming after five other things in a series

trans.tran_cn: （英国中学的最高年级）六年级，[乐]六度音程
trans.tran_en: one of six equal parts of something
one of six equal parts of something
